content.question: Consider the polar curve r = 2sin(3θ) for 0 ≤ θ ≤ π. (a) In the xy-plane provided below, sketch the curve.

frqParts.text: Consider the polar curve r = 2sin(3θ) for 0 ≤ θ ≤ π. (a) In the xy-plane provided below, sketch the curve.
(b) Find the area of the region inside the curve.
